recipes.title: Hard Boiled Egg
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil water
2. Add Egg
3. Set timer 7 mins
4. Remove water
5. Add tap water
6. Set timer 2 mins
7. Removed egg shells

recipes.title: Boiled Egg
recipes.instructions:
1. Boil water 5 mins
2. Place Egg
3. Boil for 2 mins
4. Pour water out
5. sit in cool water 2 mins
